Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: My teacher knows the success criteria that we supposed to meet and AI did not know that so the feedback that Al provide was too general and did not really suit to my study.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: My teacher will praise the part I did good and that will boost my confidence but Al just generate what it want to say and most of the time its only improvement and that make me feel I did everything wrong.
